verses.text:
How perfect is thy word!
Thy judgments are all just;
And ever in thy promise, Lord,
May man securely trust.

I hear thy word in love,
In faith thy word receive;
O send thy Spirit from above,
To teach thy word to give.

Thy counsels all are plain,
Thy precepts all are pure;
And long as heaven and earth remain,
Thy truth shall still endure.

O, may my soul in joy
Trust thee through every word;
Be it through life my glad employ
To keep thy faithful word.
